responsibilities: Lead the design, implementation, and testing of data systems from architecture to production.
Contribute to the development of long-term data strategies and roadmaps.
Develop and maintain the “source of truth” data environment for Klaviyo.
Architect and productionize batch and real-time data systems.
Build ETLs to ingest multiple terabytes of data per day.
Ensure the quality, performance, and stability of data systems.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Platform Engineering, Security, Product, Finance, and more.
Build data governance solutions ensuring compliance and security standards.
Mentor and coach team members to enhance their skills and performance.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on designing, implementing, and maintaining data systems, as well as ensuring their quality and performance. There is no mention of working with language models or tasks related to fine-tuning or customizing them. The responsibilities are more aligned with data engineering and governance rather than machine learning or language model customization.
